CGroupBoxControl

A GroupBox control.  Nothing special.

This control extends CControl.  All basic properties and functions are implemented and documented in this class.

Summary
CGroupBoxControlA GroupBox control.
Functions and Properties
AddControlAdds a control to this groupbox.
ControlsAn array of controls added to this groupbox.
HideHides the groupbox and all of its controls
Show()Shows the groupbox and all of its controls
DisableDisables the groupbox and all of its controls
Enable()Enables the groupbox and all of its controls

Functions and Properties

AddControl

Adds a control to this groupbox.  The parameters correspond to the Add() function of CGUI, but the coordinates are relative to the GroupBox.

Parameters

TypeThe type of the control.
NameThe name of the control.
OptionsOptions used for creating the control.  X and Y coordinates are relative to the GroupBox.
TextThe text of the control.

Controls

An array of controls added to this groupbox.  The controls are accessed by name.

Hide

Hides the groupbox and all of its controls

Show()

Shows the groupbox and all of its controls

Disable

Disables the groupbox and all of its controls

Enable()

Enables the groupbox and all of its controls

Basic control class from which all controls extend.
